system.description:
Specializations: Type or model blaster — blaster pistols, surface-to-surface blaster artillery, heavy blaster cannon.

A character’s ability to fix and modify blaster weapons (character-, speeder- and walker-scale) is represented by his blaster repair skill. The cost and difficulty to repair weapons depends upon how badly it is damaged — see “Weapons” in “Using Repair Skills” above.

Note vibroblades, slugthrowers, and other non-blaster weapons are repaired and modified using the equipment repair skill.
system.time_taken: In general, 15 minutes, then one hour, then one day, then two days. May be customized to circumstances.
system.label: OD6S.CHAR_SKILLS
